description.value:
Wondrous item, common
This talisman is a piece of burnished copper, shaped into a curved fang with a large crack through the middle. While wearing the talisman, you can use an action to cast the @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPencryptdecrypt]{encrypt/ decrypt} spell. The talisman canâ€™t be used this way again until 1 hour has passed.
